main event: On January 29, 1958, a sighting near Oxford, North Carolina, was reported where an object appeared to move in a circling motion.
interesting points: The object was observed coming down and going back up, possibly resembling a balloon or aircraft, The sighting was conducted through ground-visual observation, A military member noted the object's low altitude between 500 to 1500 feet, The object was described as a bright light hovering close to the ground, Multiple witnesses, including a milk truck driver and police officers, reported the sighting.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: a milk truck driver and officers from the Oxford Police Department
